name: Under the Galactic Railroad
description:
A short game about watching stars, drawing constellations in the sky,

solving a small mystery discovering planets and reconnecting with an old friend.

Made in a week for the Godot Wild Jam 34 "Space".

This is game jam entry and therefore poorly optimzed. Please play the download version for the best experience. For some reason the textures on the notebook are too bright in the browser version. And loading in the browser version can take a really long time on weaker machines.

There is also an annoying issue with mouse capturing in the browser version, sorry. Clicking in the game and tapping TAB should help.

Controls

F4 - Close game
TAB - Toggle drawing mode
F1 - Clear sky
F8 - Reset game

To draw star constellations, enter drawing mode (TAB) and draw lines between bright stars. You can undo lines by pressing the right mouse button. To finish a constellation, give it a name by pressing SPACE.

Credits

A game made by fenchel (@fenchel_).

Used assets:

  • "Ice Shine Bells" by h (CC0) https://opengameart.org/content/ice-shine-bells
  • "A kinda cool sound effect" by Spring (CC0) https://opengameart.org/content/a-kinda-cool-sound-effect
  • "Bell Sounds" by marcelofg55 (CC-BY-3.0) https://opengameart.org/content/bell-sounds
  • "10 Book Page Flips" by Starninjas (CC0) https://opengameart.org/content/10-book-page-flips
